faq.question: What is the Bulk Product Uploading App?
faq.answer: The Bulk Product Uploading App allows you to easily import and export products across multiple eCommerce platforms, including Shopify, WooCommerce, Amazon, Walmart, Etsy, BigCommerce, and more. With our app, you can streamline your product management process and move data between platforms effortlessly.

faq.question: Which platforms are supported for product import and export?
faq.answer: We support Shopify, WooCommerce, Magento, BigCommerce, AliExpress, Etsy, eBay, and custom CSV platforms.

faq.question: How do I import products into my store?
faq.answer: Simply export your product list from any supported platform and upload the CSV file to the app. Products will be imported into your Shopify store.

faq.question: How do I export products from Shopify to other platforms?
faq.answer: Choose the platform you want to export to, and the app will generate a ready-to-download CSV file.

faq.question: What types of plans are available?
faq.answer: We offer several plans: Free, Shop Plan, Warehouse Plan, Factory Plan, Franchise Plan, and Citadel Plan.

faq.question: What is the difference between the plans?
faq.answer: The difference is in the number of products you can import/export, supported platforms, and priority support options.

faq.question: Do I get support if I need help with the app?
faq.answer: Yes, we offer support via email, live chat, and help docs.

faq.question: What information do I need to provide for support?
faq.answer: You will need to provide your name, email, collaboration code, store password (for previous reasons), and a detailed message.

faq.question: What happens if I exceed the product limits of my plan?
faq.answer: If you exceed the limit, you will need to upgrade to a higher plan.

faq.question: Can I cancel my subscription at any time?
faq.answer: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time, and the cancellation will take effect at the end of the current billing cycle.

faq.question: How do I contact support?
faq.answer: You can contact us via email, live chat, or through the help docs.

faq.question: What is the 'Custom CSV' option?
faq.answer: The 'Custom CSV' option allows you to import and export product data using your own custom CSV file format.
